pluginstrument.author: flyatr
pluginstrument.description:
Clock with local and zulu time display and stopwatch. The clock in the ATR does not look like this. It just fills the space on my panel and has the same design as the temperature gauge.
V 1.16 - Due to the changes in 1.15, the GMT time didn't change until the function was called by the simulator.
V 1.15 - Some scripting mistakes corrected by Sim Innovations. And it now works on bus voltage instead of battery switch state
V 1.11 - Replaced jpg by png
V 1.1 - The bezel can now be hidden by clicking in the top left corner of the instrument - Display off when battery off
